title: Please help identify a 70's Sci-Fi/Biker font
content:
I see this font on 70’s Sci-Fi paperbacks all the time. It’s mostly used in all caps, but it also appears in U&LC in the logo for “Easyriders” magazine. It has a vaguely art nouveau look, but also a lot of 70’s counter-culture connections.

Here is a link to an example:  
 [http://4.bp.blogspot.com/\_kRm2JG596XA/R8XikknGoDI/AAAAAAAAASs/BLYvQvPnWF...](http://web.archive.org/web/20090627135858/http:/4.bp.blogspot.com/_kRm2JG596XA/R8XikknGoDI/AAAAAAAAASs/BLYvQvPnWFA/s400/Sailor+on+the+seas+of+fate+cover+3.JPG "http://4.bp.blogspot.com/\_kRm2JG596XA/R8XikknGoDI/AAAAAAAAASs/BLYvQvPnWFA/s400/Sailor+on+the+seas+of+fate+cover+3.JPG")

Can anyone tell me the font name, and if there is a downloadable freeware or shareware version? Thanks.

- Rich
author: Dr. Zontar
